text:
. They don’t usually 
last long but can be quite 
heavy. As long as you don’t 
lose a lot of blood, there is 
nothing  to worry about. You 
may	also	find	that	your	nose	
gets more blocked up than 
usual.
How to stop nose bleeds
• Sit with your head forward.
• Press the sides of your 
nose together between 
your	thumb	and	forefinger,	
just below the bony part, 
for 10 minutes and try not 
to swallow the blood.
• Repeat for a further 
10 minutes if this is 
unsuccessful.
• If the bleeding continue
